title: Advanced Poetry Writing Learning Course Through Mobile Simulation in K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational poetry composition theory and mastery of literary expression techniques
context.additional_context: Creative poetry composition training using VR simulations in a mobile app-based interactive learning environment, incorporating personalized feedback and peer assessment systems for learners.

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more polished poems by applying creative techniques specific to various poetic forms (free verse, formal verse, etc.).
Use AI analysis tools in mobile apps to critically evaluate their own poetry and derive three or more improvement strategies.
Creatively construct five or more symbolism and metaphor systems through interactive activities that expand spatial imagination in VR simulations.

resources: Mobile Application for Poetry Creation Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
